TEI.2.document_title: Edward Lovelace to Stephen F. Austin, 11-20-1821

barker_notes.barker_footnotes: For fianl settlement of this account see below, March 30, 1822.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 431

div1.p: One hundred Twenty days after date (this my only exchange same tenor and date) pay Mr Stephen F Austin or order Five Hundred Dollars value received and charge the same to

p.person_mentioned: Messrs. Reynolds and Ralston New Orleans

div1.p: Recd Pay of the above Amt say Five Hundred & Twelve 50/100 Dolls
